section.i: ##Compare with OSCM / Gertis input on access

section.p: As soon as you have successfully carried out the manual configuration steps, access is enabled for users in OpenStack Horizon. They can now access the monitoring and log management functions provided they fulfill the following prerequisites:

li.p: They must have access to the OpenStack platform as a user with the monasca-user role or any other role that is authorized to use the functions. Additional roles are optional.
They must be assigned to the OpenStack project they want to monitor.
